tei:classSpec.tei:desc: This attribute class provides attributes midi.channel and midi.port.

tei:attDef.tei:desc: Channel numbering starts with 0! The first MIDI channel is 0. the 16th MIDI channel is 15.
Each MIDI device (MIDI port) can have up to 16 channels (i.e. voices) which is sometimes not enough, e.g. for an orchestral setup. To address further voices choose another port.

tei:remarks.tei:p: Keep in mind that the playback of a MIDI file that addresses multiple ports requires the system (or digital audio workstation) to provide multiple MIDI devices/outputs accordingly.
